author: Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg
title: Meredith Corp. Makes the Case for Magazines
text:
Stephen Lacy, executive chairman of Meredith Corp., the magazine publisher and owner of 17 broadcast television stations, has had his share of disappointments. In 2013, he tried to buy a group of magazines from Time Warner Inc., only to see Time Warner spin off all its magazines under the Time Inc. umbrella.
Mr. Lacy persisted. Meredith—with its long history of women’s service titles that include Better Homes & Gardens, Shape and Allrecipes—appeared the most likely partner for Time Inc., whose properties include such...
